name: JDownloadManager
short_description: Easy to use download manager written in Java, which can be used as a standalone application or embedded as an Applet. Supports multiple parallel downloads, downloads in chunks, resuming downloads, auto-retries after errors and a customizable UI.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
